channel.title: How do i make npc say im online
channel.description: need some1 2 help me with making my npc say my name

item.title: How do i make npc say im online
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

open up npchandler.java

search for

“moo”

underneath that add

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(50) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("NAMEHERE")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "NAMEHERE is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "NAMEHERE is OFFLINE"; } } } }

hope this helps you

metal

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc say im online
